body:
Hmmm #2.

Just to be sure about the status of this thread.

Regarding question 1: The definition is fine and the problem comes from gencumulativesky? I see in the [DIVA](http://diva4rhino.com/user-guide/simulation-types/radiation-maps)site that they show "proudly" the radiation renders. I assume they are doing right ... should i? Just can't get so far where is the "leak" in this one.

As for question 2: any recommendations?



Thanks,

-A.

P.S. Just now i see Mostapha's answer from 3 hours ago that he is checking. So sorry for writing this "in the middle" of this process.
